items.name: iPhone 13
items.shortDescription: The iPhone 13 features a powerful A15 Bionic chip and a dual-camera system for exceptional photography.

items.name: MacBook Air
items.shortDescription: The MacBook Air is a thin and lightweight laptop with an M1 chip and a brilliant Retina display.

items.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
items.shortDescription: The Galaxy S21 Ultra is a flagship smartphone with a powerful camera system and a large AMOLED display.

items.name: Samsung 55-Inch QLED 4K TV
items.shortDescription: This QLED TV delivers stunning 4K visuals with Quantum Dot technology and smart features.

items.name: Sony PlayStation 5
items.shortDescription: The PlayStation 5 offers incredible gaming experiences with ultra-fast load times and exclusive titles.

items.name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
items.shortDescription: These noise-canceling headphones provide premium sound quality and comfort for an immersive audio experience.

items.name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
items.shortDescription: The Pixel 6 Pro boasts an excellent camera system, stock Android experience, and 5G connectivity.

items.name: Google Nest Hub
items.shortDescription: The Nest Hub is a smart display that can control smart home devices, display information, and play music.

items.name: Intel Core i9-11900K Processor
items.shortDescription: The Core i9-11900K is a high-performance CPU for gaming and content creation.

items.name: Intel 1TB 660p NVMe SSD
items.shortDescription: This NVMe SSD offers fast storage for your PC with reliable performance.

items.name: Canon EOS 5D Mark IV
items.shortDescription: The EOS 5D Mark IV is a professional-grade DSLR camera with outstanding image quality.

items.name: Canon PIXMA Pro-100 Printer
items.shortDescription: The PIXMA Pro-100 is a high-quality photo printer for professional photographers and enthusiasts.
